ygData.subject: Re: Hello everyone.
ygData.msgSnippet: I don t know if you ll find a local group of people that play everquest since it s an online community. Don t let distance stop you from making friends though,
ygData.messageBody:
I don't know if you'll find a local group of people that play everquest
since it's an online community. Don't let distance stop you from making
friends though, because there are some great people who play this game
from all over the world. I've made friends with a bard from Israel and
a druid from England, and I currently live in NYC. If you or anyone is
on Stromm and needs some help or is looking to make friends just send
an ingame /tell to Karrola 70 beastlord. I also am co-leader of a
friendship based guild on stromm and we can help you learn the game and
get some basic gear to start with.





--- In EverQuest@yahoogroups.com, "Mike Moya" <laffys@y...> wrote:
>
> Well wanted to say hello to all. Just joined today! Also started
> playing Everquest like a few days ago. So I hope that this group would
> enhance my game playing. One more thing, I wanted to know how I can
> look for local Everquest groups. I live in Brooksville, FL. So if
> anyone has any ideas, please let me know. Thanks.
>
